meanings.definition: A group of people appointed for a specific function or task.
meanings.sent1: The school committee decided on the new playground equipment.
meanings.sent2: The committee gathered to plan the charity event.
meanings.sent3: The committee members all wore silly hats to their meeting.
meanings.sent4: The committee worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The image of the committee members diligently working stayed with me.

meanings.definition: A group of people who meet regularly to manage or discuss a particular issue.
meanings.sent1: The safety committee inspected the building for hazards.
meanings.sent2: The committee discussed the budget for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: The committee meeting turned into a lively debate about pizza toppings.
meanings.sent4: The committee's discussions were a battlefield of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the committee's heated debates lingered in the room.
